name: Press On (jeefjerfy)
description:
The final leg of any journey can sometimes feel the longest. All that's left is to flee this dark labyrinth, your final destination. Yet darkness clings to this place like day-old toothpaste, obscuring the way forward and slowing your progress. If you stand still for even a second, the gloom will bring you back to where you began. Can you fend off the creeping shadows and escape?

Controls: WASD or arrow keys to move. Space bar drops  glittering stones you can use to create markers within the maze. Press Escape to quit.

This game was made over the week of 10/4/2020, the fourth in my deck of many games, where I try to make a game a week, every week, for a year.
